0010000111110100 1011101010100111 1 -> sum: 1101110010011100, cout: 0

0011110010110101 1011100111110000 1 -> sum: 1111011010100110, cout: 0

0101100111011101 1110101011111011 0 -> sum: 0100010011011000, cout: 1
